room_title: Escape room "The Crime Scene" by Escape Strategy in Chicago
review: What a fun experience! I loved the thoughtful clues and set up of the Crime Scene Room! I am super impressed! I will definitely be returning in the future! I HIGHLY recommend Escape Strategy.

room_title: Escape room "The Crime Scene" by Escape Strategy in Chicago
review: Santa brought this gift for our family of 5 and we had a blast. We had two adults and three teenagers. We did the crime scene room which is very fun, especially if you like crime shows. The puzzles were tricky and thought-provoking but not impossible. The staff was very friendly. Highly recommend and will definitely go back to do the other rooms!!

room_title: Escape room "The Crime Scene" by Escape Strategy in Chicago
review: This was great- especially for our family because we love puzzles and mysteries. We had 4 people (our family) in the Crime Scene room and made it out with 15 minutes to spare. Staff was friendly. Room was fun and challenging. We will definitely do more of these rooms.

room_title: Escape room "The Crime Scene" by Escape Strategy in Chicago
review: I went with a group of friends, there was six of us. We did the Crime Scene Room. We had a blast. The clues were very challenging and we were so happy when we figured one out.Though ultimately, we failed in our quest to get out of the room it was still so much fun. Seriously, we needed another minute and we would have had it.The staff was great and take care of you and your belongings. If you're looking for an Escape Room place to go, I highly recommend Escape Strategy.We are definitely going back to do another room and looking forward to it. Awesome place!
